008
009public class ObjectiveGradientEstimator<N extends Number> {

035//    private Pair<Vector<N>, Integer> accumulateGradients(DataSet<N> trainingSet, TrainableFunction<N> trainableFunction, ObjectiveFunction<N> objectiveFunction) {
036//        Vector<N> accumulatedGradient = null;
037//        int total = 0;
038//        for (DataSet.Sample<N> sample : trainingSet) {
039//            if (accumulatedGradient == null) {
040//                accumulatedGradient = determineGradient(sample, trainableFunction, objectiveFunction);
041//            } else {
042//                accumulatedGradient = accumulatedGradient.add(determineGradient(sample, trainableFunction, objectiveFunction));
043//            }
044//            total++;
045//        }
046//        return Pair.of(accumulatedGradient, total);
047//    }
048
049    public Vector<N> determineGradient(DataSet.Sample<N> sample, TrainableFunction<N> estimationFunction, ObjectiveFunction<N> objectiveFunction) {
050        N[] estimated = estimationFunction.estimate(sample.features());
051        N[] target = sample.targetOutputs();
052        N[] gradients = objectiveFunction.calculateGradient_dJ_da(1, estimated, target);
053        return Vectors.of(estimationFunction.getCurrentNumberType(), gradients).transpose();
054    }
055
056}
